name: Unknown object
description:
A sci-fi survival game with a randomly generated world and creatures.

You are a member of the unknown planet exploration team. Once your teammates almost die, but you courageously save them left alone on an unknown planet.

In Unknown Object, you will have to catch different creatures and get useful resources from them to make fuel in order to fly away from this planet.

In the game, the planet is randomly generated, just like the creatures, and so after each death, you will need to explore the planet again.

Possible problems and questions:

  • Sometimes the key may not work if this happens, just press again.
  • If finding the point for teleportation has been going on for quite a long time(more than 20 seconds), we recommend pressing Escape and pressing the Restart button.
  • The incubator allows you to get fuel from the creatures to complete the game.
